EmailTemplate.name: 20190829_Global_Q4 Price Change_KFK.20190829_Global_Q4 Price Change_Email_KFK
EmailTemplate.subject: Catalog Pricing Updates Coming October 1, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear Customer,
Honeywell will update the Commercial Spares, Commercial Universal Flat Rate (UFR) and D&S Universal Flat Rate catalog pricing on select parts effective October 1, 2019. To view the published part numbers impacted by this pricing update, access the MyAerospace downloadable catalogs <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/pricing-catalogs]]> and filter on the column called ‘Revised Price’.
To prevent order disruptions, please take the following actions:
- After September 1, 2019: Access the updated pricing on Honeywell MyAerospace, EDI interfaces, downloadable Spares and UFR catalog files. - Effective October 1, 2019: Our new prices will be incorporated in MyAerospace online ordering and EDI interfaces. Please review the new pricing and apply it to all new purchase orders created on or after October 1, 2019. In addition, please update your pricing system with the new pricing information.
The MyAerospace Portal <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/o02tZ008N00lEQ0hzXIGrq0]]> is always available for your order management needs, including parts quoting, ordering, and tracking. View MyAerospace updates and tutorials here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/I0l0uQz0qhE9ZG2r0N0IX00]]>.
If you have any questions, please contact your Honeywell business focal.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace
